## MenuMaker.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `MenuMaker` class

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  containerId | string | ID of an element that content will be inserted into. |
|  menuFileName | string | URL and filename of the menu JSON file. |
